heroSection.title: German UDS Innovation GmbH: Digital Innovation Ecosystem
heroSection.subtitle: Our integrated ecosystem connects academic excellence with entrepreneurial practice through strategic investments and services.
heroSection.quote: Transforming university research into marketable digital products and business models through our vertical participation structure.

investCommercial.title: Our Investment Portfolio

stakeholders.service: 100% stake in German UDS Service GmbH – responsible for the IT infrastructure for the university and external partners
stakeholders.cloudhouse: 20% stake in FB Cloudhouse GmbH – handles administrative tasks and space rental
stakeholders.university: 20% participation in German UDS gGmbH – guarantees creative involvement in the university

investCommercial.uspDescription: Our vertical structure directly involves professors and research centers in newly founded verticals. This transforms university research into marketable digital products and business models.
investCommercial.keyPeopleDescription: These professors and experts lead verticals and research initiatives at German UDS, bridging academia with digital innovation.

footer.description: Our integrated ecosystem connects academic excellence with entrepreneurial practice through strategic investments and services.
footer.stayUpdated: Stay updated with our latest investment opportunities and innovations.

business.title: Business Model
business.subtitle: Our Approach
business.description: Our core business combines strategic investments with consulting services and innovation utilization.

card1.title: 1. Investments
card1.description: Strategic development of companies in collaboration with the German University of Digital Science

card2.title: 2. Consulting and Services
card2.description: IT, Marketing, Sales, Personnel and Project Development

card3.title: 3. Innovation
card3.description: Research to market transfer, Open source

card4.title: 4. Planned Vertical Shareholding
card4.description: Professor and Research Center involvement structure

point1.title: Investment Requirements
point1.description: Initial phase: Build administrative infrastructure. Further development: Finance new investments and verticals.

point2.title: Income Sources
point2.description: Dividends from investments. Consulting fees. Government grants for innovation projects.

point3.title: Risk Management
point3.description: Diversified portfolio across technology sectors. Transparent reporting to investors.

contact.title: Interested in Investing?
contact.subtitle: Get In Touch
contact.description: Contact us to learn more about German UDS Innovation GmbH and discover how you can be part of our digital innovation ecosystem.

innovation.title: Digital Innovator
innovation.description: As a catalyst, German UDS Innovation GmbH promotes sustainable technology transfer between science and industry and achieves attractive returns on investment.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Promote innovation through targeted participation. Create value for investors. Connect German University of Digital Science and business through integration.
